title: Yingxiong Zai Lin
alternative_title: The Hero's Return, Yingxiong? Wo Zao Jiu Bu Dang Le, 英雄？我早就不当了, Hero Return,  英雄再临
description: Zero was mankind’s first real superhero. Under his watch, countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However, after 5 years of war, Zero disappeared without a trace.
